name: Banking System - Strategic Design Only
description: Strategic design for a banking domain (subdomains and bounded contexts)

inputs.domainDescription: A modern digital banking platform providing core banking services including account management, fund transfers, bill payments, and loan processing. The system handles customer onboarding with KYC verification, maintains account balances and transaction history, processes internal and external transfers, manages loan applications and approvals, and provides real-time fraud detection and compliance monitoring.

contextPatterns: Transaction → Risk Management: Published Language (transaction events)
All Contexts → Compliance: Open Host Service
